Spain: Battle of Bair√©n: An Aragonese army pinned between Almoravid forces and the Mediterranean Sea routed their enemies near modern Gandia. Battle of Consuegra: An Almoravid force defeated one of Alfonso the Brave's armies near Consuegra. Peter I married Bertha of Aragon in Huesca, marking the transfer of the Aragonese capital from Jaca.
Syria: First Crusade: The forces of the First Crusade captured Antioch.
